Class SamlServiceProvider

java.lang.Object
iu.auth.saml.SamlServiceProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
iu.auth.config.IuAuthConfig, iu.auth.config.IuSamlServiceProvider, iu.auth.principal.PrincipalVerifier<SamlPrincipal>
public final class SamlServiceProvider extends Object implements iu.auth.config.IuSamlServiceProvider, iu.auth.principal.PrincipalVerifier<SamlPrincipal>

      public SamlServiceProvider(URI postUri, String realm, edu.iu.auth.config.IuSamlServiceProviderMetadata config)
      Initialize SAML provider
      Parameters:
      postUri - HTTP POST Binding URI
      realm - authentication realm to use for reloading the config as needed for future operations.
      config - IuSamlServiceProviderMetadata

    • serviceProviderIdentity

      static edu.iu.auth.IuPrincipalIdentity serviceProviderIdentity(edu.iu.auth.config.IuSamlServiceProviderMetadata config)
      Looks for an authoritative trusted issuer identity matching the SAML Service Provider configuration and returns its principal identity.

      This identity will have private WebKey credentials with kid values verify and encrypt suitable for use with SP-related crypto operations.

      Parameters:
      config - IuSamlServiceProviderMetadata
      Returns:
      IuPrincipalIdentity

    • verifyResponse

      SamlPrincipal verifyResponse(InetAddress address, String samlResponse, String sessionId)
      Authorize SAML response return back from IDP
      Parameters:
      address - IP address use by user to authenticate
      samlResponse - xml SAML response back from identity provider
      sessionId - SAML session ID from original AuthnRequest
      Returns:
      SamlPrincipal
